languages.text: "Каждый агент Золотого Трона — лишь ничтожный винтик в системе, призванной защищать Империум Человечества. Я руководствуюсь своим обязательством незамедлительно реагировать на угрозы нашему виду". {n}Хейнрикс медлит.{/n} "Подобная необходимость редко совпадает с шансом спасти одного из наших. Я не буду врать, утверждая, что я {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}не рад этому{/d}".

"Every agent of the Golden Throne is an insignificant cog in a system designed to protect the Imperium of Man. My responsibility to respond expeditiously to threats against our kind guides my every action." {n}Heinrix pauses.{/n} "That same responsibility rarely brings with it the chance to save a fellow agent's life. I will not lie and say that I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}not glad{/d} to have this chance today."
languages.original_text: "Каждый агент Золотого Трона — лишь ничтожный винтик в системе, призванной защищать Империум Человечества. Я руководствуюсь своим обязательством незамедлительно реагировать на угрозы нашему виду". {n}Хейнрикс медлит.{/n} "Подобная необходимость редко совпадает с шансом спасти одного из наших. Я не буду врать, утверждая, что я {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}не рад этому{/d}".

I will not lie and say that I am not glad to have this chance today."

"Every agent of the Golden Throne is an insignificant cog in a system designed to protect the Imperium of Man. I will not lie and say that I am not glad to have this chance today."

"Every agent of the Golden Throne is an insignificant cog in a system designed to protect the Imperium of Man. My responsibility to respond expeditiously to threats against our kind guides my every action." {n}Heinrix pauses.{/n} "That same responsibility rarely brings with it the chance to save a fellow agent's life. I will not lie and say that I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}not glad{/d} to have this chance today."

languages.text: “黄金王座的每位代理人都是整个人类帝国微不足道的一环，旨在保护人类不受威胁所害。我的责任是迅速解决那些针对人类的威胁，我的一举一动都是出于这个目的。”{n}海因里希顿了顿。{/n}“由于职责所限，我很少有机会能拯救同伴的性命。如今有了这样的机会，我很{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}开心{/d}。在这一点上，我并不打算撒谎。”
languages.original_text: "Every agent of the Golden Throne is an insignificant cog in a system designed to protect the Imperium of Man. My responsibility to respond expeditiously to threats against our kind guides my every action." {n}Heinrix pauses.{/n} "That same responsibility rarely brings with it the chance to save a fellow agent's life. I will not lie and say that I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}not glad{/d} to have this chance today."

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座的每位代理人都是整个人类帝国微不足道的一环，旨在保护人类不受威胁所害。我的责任是迅速解决那些针对人类的威胁，我的一举一动都是出于这个目的。”{n}海因里希顿了顿。{/n}“由于职责所限，我很少有机会能拯救同伴的性命。如今有了这样的机会，我很开心。在这一点上，我并不打算撒谎。”

languages.text: «Todos los agentes del Trono Dorado somos un engranaje insignificante del sistema que protege al Imperium de la Humanidad. La responsabilidad de responder con presteza a las amenazas a nuestra especie guía mis actos». {n}Heinrix hace una pausa.{/n} «Esa misma responsabilidad conlleva, muy raramente, la oportunidad de salvar la vida de otro agente. No voy a mentir: {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}me agrada{/d} poder hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "Every agent of the Golden Throne is an insignificant cog in a system designed to protect the Imperium of Man. My responsibility to respond expeditiously to threats against our kind guides my every action." {n}Heinrix pauses.{/n} "That same responsibility rarely brings with it the chance to save a fellow agent's life. I will not lie and say that I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}not glad{/d} to have this chance today."

traits.locale_text: «Todos los agentes del Trono Dorado somos un engranaje insignificante del sistema que protege al Imperium de la Humanidad. La responsabilidad de responder con presteza a las amenazas a nuestra especie guía mis actos». {n}Heinrix hace una pausa.{/n} «Esa misma responsabilidad conlleva, muy raramente, la oportunidad de salvar la vida de otro agente. No voy a mentir: me agrada poder hacerlo».

languages.text: 「黄金の玉座のすべてのエージェントは、人類の帝国を守るために設計されたシステムの取るに足らない部品です。人類という種族に対する脅威に迅速に対応するという責任こそが、我のあらゆる行動の指針です」{n}ハインリックスは一旦言葉を止める。{/n}「この責任が、共に働く仲間のエージェントの命を救う機会をもたらすことはめったにありません。だからこそ、今日、機会を得たことを正直{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}嬉しく{/d}思っているのです」
languages.original_text: "Every agent of the Golden Throne is an insignificant cog in a system designed to protect the Imperium of Man. My responsibility to respond expeditiously to threats against our kind guides my every action." {n}Heinrix pauses.{/n} "That same responsibility rarely brings with it the chance to save a fellow agent's life. I will not lie and say that I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}not glad{/d} to have this chance today."

traits.locale_text: 「黄金の玉座のすべてのエージェントは、人類の帝国を守るために設計されたシステムの取るに足らない部品です。人類という種族に対する脅威に迅速に対応するという責任こそが、我のあらゆる行動の指針です」{n}ハインリックスは一旦言葉を止める。{/n}「この責任が、共に働く仲間のエージェントの命を救う機会をもたらすことはめったにありません。だからこそ、今日、機会を得たことを正直{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}嬉しく{/d}思っているのです」

languages.text: « Chaque agent du Trône d'Or est un rouage insignifiant dans un système conçu pour protéger l'Imperium de l'humanité. J'ai le devoir de contrer rapidement toute menace pesant sur notre espèce, un engagement qui guide chacune de mes actions. » {n}Heinrix marque une pause.{/n} « Dans l'exécution de ce devoir, il est rare d'avoir l'occasion de sauver la vie d'un autre agent. Je ne vais pas vous mentir en affirmant que je {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}ne suis pas heureux{/d} que cette opportunité se présente aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "Every agent of the Golden Throne is an insignificant cog in a system designed to protect the Imperium of Man. My responsibility to respond expeditiously to threats against our kind guides my every action." {n}Heinrix pauses.{/n} "That same responsibility rarely brings with it the chance to save a fellow agent's life. I will not lie and say that I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}not glad{/d} to have this chance today."

traits.locale_text: « Chaque agent du Trône d'Or est un rouage insignifiant dans un système conçu pour protéger l'Imperium de l'humanité. J'ai le devoir de contrer rapidement toute menace pesant sur notre espèce, un engagement qui guide chacune de mes actions. » {n}Heinrix marque une pause.{/n} « Dans l'exécution de ce devoir, il est rare d'avoir l'occasion de sauver la vie d'un autre agent. Je ne vais pas vous mentir en affirmant que je ne suis pas heureux que cette opportunité se présente aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: "Jeder Agent des Goldenen Throns ist ein unbedeutendes Zahnrad in einem System, das das Imperium der Menschheit beschützen soll. Meine Verantwortung, rasch auf Bedrohungen gegen unsere Art zu reagieren, bestimmt mein gesamtes Handeln." {n}Heinrix hält kurz inne.{/n} "Dieselbe Verantwortung bringt nur selten eine Chance mit sich, das Leben eines anderen Agenten zu retten. Ich will nicht lügen und sage daher, dass ich {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}nicht froh{/d} bin, diese Chance heute zu haben."
languages.original_text: "Every agent of the Golden Throne is an insignificant cog in a system designed to protect the Imperium of Man. My responsibility to respond expeditiously to threats against our kind guides my every action." {n}Heinrix pauses.{/n} "That same responsibility rarely brings with it the chance to save a fellow agent's life. I will not lie and say that I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}not glad{/d} to have this chance today."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder Agent des Goldenen Throns ist ein unbedeutendes Zahnrad in einem System, das das Imperium der Menschheit beschützen soll. Meine Verantwortung, rasch auf Bedrohungen gegen unsere Art zu reagieren, bestimmt mein gesamtes Handeln." {n}Heinrix hält kurz inne.{/n} "Dieselbe Verantwortung bringt nur selten eine Chance mit sich, das Leben eines anderen Agenten zu retten. Ich will nicht lügen und sage daher, dass ich froh bin, diese Chance heute zu haben."

languages.text: "Altın Taht'ın hizmetindeki herkes, İnsan İmparatorluğu'nu korumak için tasarlanmış bir sistemdeki önemsiz bir dişlidir. Her bir eylemim, türümüze yönelik tehditlere süratle yanıt verme sorumluluğum doğrultusundadır." {n}Heinrix duraksıyor.{/n} "Bu sorumluluk, dost bir ajanın yaşamını kurtarma fırsatını çok nadiren yanında getirir. Bugün elime geçen bu fırsat için {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}şükretmediğimi{/d} söylesem yalan söylemiş olurdum."
languages.original_text: "Every agent of the Golden Throne is an insignificant cog in a system designed to protect the Imperium of Man. My responsibility to respond expeditiously to threats against our kind guides my every action." {n}Heinrix pauses.{/n} "That same responsibility rarely brings with it the chance to save a fellow agent's life. I will not lie and say that I am {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}not glad{/d} to have this chance today."

traits.locale_text: "Altın Taht'ın hizmetindeki herkes, İnsan İmparatorluğu'nu korumak için tasarlanan bir sistemdeki önemsiz bir dişliden ibarettir. Benim her bir eylemime, türümüze yönelik tehditlere süratle yanıt verme sorumluluğum kılavuzluk eder." {n}Heinrix duraksıyor.{/n} "Bu sorumluluk, dost bir ajanın yaşamını kurtarma fırsatını da yanında çok nadiren getirir. Bugün elime geçen bu fırsat için {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}şükretmediğimi{/d} söylesem, yalan söylemiş olurdum."
